29 April 2014

Ruby 4 secret_key_base

Something that caught be out week was the introduction of the secret_key base in Rails 4. When adding a new environment make sure to add the secret_key_base for your environment in config/secrets.yml. development: secret_key_base: YOUR_DEVELOPMENT_KEY_HERE test: secret_key_base: YOUR_TEST_KEY_HERE staging: secret_key_base: YOUR_STAGING_KEY_HERE production: secret_key_base: YOUR_PRODUCTION_KEY_HERE
